duties_responsibilities.duty: Address complex accounting issues with demonstrated conceptual judgment and initiative.
Ability to coach and mentor others in a fast-paced environment.
Manage, direct and coordinate work of staff in all areas of accounting.
Review work product of accounting staff for quality and timeliness.
Respond to staff questions related to client issues, workload, HR matters, etc.
Consistently achieve monthly client profitability standards.
Manage day to day client relationships in all areas including client questions regarding deliverables, staff issues, general accounting matters, etc.
Maintain work papers and preparation of monthly financial statements.
Analyze and reconcile general ledger accounts.

education_certification.credential: BA in Accounting or Finance preferred
